price: Ani garuu Inni, Allaah’n Gooftaa kiyya; ani Gooftaa kiyyatti tokkollee hin qindeessu.
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
